definition: North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: Wei Zhijiang, a Chinese expert on Korea, agreed.
sentences.chinese: 中国韩朝问题专家魏志江同意这个说法。

sentences.english: Now, he wrote, "my relationship with my mother is more tense than the Korean DMZ."
sentences.chinese: 他说，“现在我和我妈的关系比韩朝关系还紧张。”

sentences.english: Jin Yingshan stressed that North Korea's attitude is the key inter-Korean dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 金英善强调，朝鲜的态度是韩朝对话的关键。

sentences.english: Recently the Korean Peninsula due to strained inter-Korean shelling.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜半岛局势近期因韩朝炮击事件呈现紧张。

sentences.english: South Korea's position is that both South and North Korea on the Korean Peninsula issue should be the leading solution.
sentences.chinese: 韩国的立场是，朝鲜半岛问题应由韩朝双方主导解决。

definition: Panmunjeom, the Joint Security Area in the Korean demilitarized zone
summit talks/discussion between heads of state
Moon Jae-in (1953-), Korean politician and human rights lawyer, president of Korea from 2017
